metadata.name: AWS IAM S3Browser User or AccessKey Creation
metadata.comment: Detects S3 Browser utility creating IAM User or AccessKey.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM api_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('iam.amazonaws.com') AND (lower(LOWER(api.operation)) in ('createuser', 'createaccesskey')) AND contains(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('s3 browser')))

output.summary: Detects S3 Browser utility creating IAM User or AccessKey.

metadata.objective: False positive: Valid usage of S3 Browser for IAM User and/or AccessKey creation Reference: https://permiso.io/blog/s/unmasking-guivil-new-cloud-threat-actor
